text: Peter Jennings (29 July 1938 - 7 August 2005) was a Canadian journalist, born in Toronto, Ontario. He was a journalist and news anchor for World News Tonight on ABC from 1983 until his death in 2005. He died in Manhattan, New York City, in 2005 of complications from lung cancer. == References == Category:1938 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Canadian journalists Category:Television news anchors Category:Writers from Toronto
title: Peter Jennings
